user_query: Assuming scientists in the famous youtube video The Thinking Machine (Artificial Intelligence in the 1960s) were interviewed the same year, what is the name of the scientist predicting the sooner thinking machines or robots? Answer using the format First name Last name

1.panel_description: Identify the scientists featured in the YouTube video 'The Thinking Machine (Artificial Intelligence in the 1960s)'.

1.handles: Identifies the scientists featured in the video.

input_vars.name: query_scientists_in_video
input_vars.description: Query to find the list of scientists featured in the video.
input_vars.value: List of scientists featured in the YouTube video 'The Thinking Machine (Artificial Intelligence in the 1960s)'.

output_vars.name: scientists_list
output_vars.description: List of scientists featured in the video.

2.panel_description: Determine if any of the scientists identified in the previous panel were interviewed in the same year as the video.

1.handles: Determines if any of the scientists were interviewed in the same year as the video.

input_vars.name: scientists_list
input_vars.description: List of scientists to check for interviews in the same year as the video.

input_vars.name: query_interviewed_scientists
input_vars.description: Query to find interviews conducted in the same year as the video featuring these scientists.
input_vars.value: Interviews conducted in the same year as 'The Thinking Machine (Artificial Intelligence in the 1960s)' featuring scientists from [scientists_list].

output_vars.name: interviewed_scientists
output_vars.description: List of scientists interviewed in the same year as the video.

3.panel_description: Identify which of the scientists, who were interviewed in the same year as the video, predicted the sooner arrival of thinking machines or robots.

1.handles: Identifies the scientist predicting the sooner arrival of thinking machines or robots.

input_vars.name: interviewed_scientists
input_vars.description: List of interviewed scientists to check for predictions.

input_vars.name: query_predicting_scientist
input_vars.description: Query to find the scientist predicting the sooner arrival of thinking machines or robots.
input_vars.value: Scientist from [interviewed_scientists] predicting the sooner arrival of thinking machines or robots in interviews conducted in the same year as 'The Thinking Machine (Artificial Intelligence in the 1960s)'.

output_vars.name: predicting_scientist
output_vars.description: Name of the scientist predicting the sooner arrival of thinking machines or robots.
